function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of optimization of natural resources and indoor environments in built infrastructure","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of evidence-based best practices for mitigating the effects of the issues","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of guidance towards evidence-based best practices for facility operations and management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infectious diseases in indoor spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-decreasing natural capital due to critical thresholds","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustainability rating systems promoting weak sustainability approach","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of infectious disease behavior in the strategies released by nature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistency in the level of environmental and economic sustainability of the strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases in office spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anxiety and burnout srs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantitatively comparing the relative contribution of airborne transmission with other transmission
